pages.text: The Totem of Amethyst is a powerful artifact reminiscent of the totems crafted by illagers. Totems have a soul, and are therefore more potent vessels than jewelry. $(l)Totems can have one passive $(o)and$() $(l)one active augment at a time.$()$(br2)If you wish to change augments, you may strip your totem of its current abilities in a $(#490)Grindstone$() or a $(l:amethyst_imbuement:altars/disenchanting_table)Disenchanting Table$()

pages.unlockDesc: Imbue a Crystalline Heart to unlock this recipe!
